tags.name:
social-share-link
`a link to share content on social`
tags.jsDoc:
/**

 * @microcopy - language worth noting:

tags.name:
social-share-link
`a link to share content on social`
tags.jsDoc:
/**
 * `social-share-link`
 * @customElement social-share-link
 * `a link to share content on social`
 *
 * @microcopy - language worth noting:
 *  -
 *

 * @polymer
 * @demo demo/index.html
 */

attributes.name: image
attributes.description:
optional image to attach to the share
(Pinterest only)
attributes.jsDoc:
/**
       * optional image to attach to the share
       * (Pinterest only)
       */

attributes.name: message
attributes.description:
the message to attach to the social share
(not used in Facebook)
attributes.jsDoc:
/**
       * the message to attach to the social share
       * (not used in Facebook)
       */

attributes.name: mode
attributes.description:
optional display mode for the link,"text-only" or "icon-only";
default is to dislay both an icon and text

attributes.name: text
attributes.description: the link text; if null, the text will be "Share on (type of social)"

attributes.name: type
attributes.description:
the type of social; currently supports
Facebook, LinkedIn, Pinterest, and Twitter (default)
attributes.jsDoc:
/**
       * the type of social; currently supports
       * Facebook, LinkedIn, Pinterest, and Twitter (default)
       */

properties.name: image
properties.description:
optional image to attach to the share
(Pinterest only)
properties.jsDoc:
/**
       * optional image to attach to the share
       * (Pinterest only)
       */

properties.name: message
properties.description:
the message to attach to the social share
(not used in Facebook)
properties.jsDoc:
/**
       * the message to attach to the social share
       * (not used in Facebook)
       */

properties.name: mode
properties.description:
optional display mode for the link,"text-only" or "icon-only";
default is to dislay both an icon and text

properties.name: text
properties.description: the link text; if null, the text will be "Share on (type of social)"

properties.name: type
properties.description:
the type of social; currently supports
Facebook, LinkedIn, Pinterest, and Twitter (default)
properties.jsDoc:
/**
       * the type of social; currently supports
       * Facebook, LinkedIn, Pinterest, and Twitter (default)
       */
